title: Council Regulation (EC) No 2308/97 of 17 November 1997 reintroducing a 12 % rate of duty to be applied to certain products falling within CN code 5607
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 2308/97 of 17 November 1997 reintroducing a 12 % rate of duty to be applied to certain products falling within CN code 5607
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 is hereby amended as follows:
>TABLE>

This Regulation shall enter into force the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 November 1997.
For the Council
The President
F. BODEN
(1) OJ L 35, 7. 2. 1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1, Regulation as last amended by Commission Regulation (EC) No 1624/97 (OJ L 224, 14. 8. 1997, p. 16).
